    thinking for 9s

    command

    $ git rev-parse --show-toplevel

│                                                                                                          │
│$ git rev-parse --show-toplevel                                                                           │
│                                                                                                          │
│Allow command?                                                                                            │
│                                                                                                          │
│  ❯ Yes (y)                                                                                               │
│    Yes, always approve this exact command for this session (a)                                           │
│    Edit or give feedback (e)                                                                             │
│    No, and keep going (n)                                                                                │
│    No, and stop for now (esc)                                                                            │
